title: Soft and smooth design​​​​​
content: The living room decorative pillow collection is made entirely from 100% cotton and will give you a soft feeling, making your living room space luxurious.

title: Sophistication in each knitting thread
content: Baskets and boxes are woven from water hyacinth plants by skilled artisans. The product is a combination of simplicity and sophistication, and is environmentally friendly.

title: Unique in each product​
content: Using coconut tree trunks, Vietnamese artisans have produced many household goods from cups, chopsticks, teapots, to decorative items such as wind chimes and lanterns.

title: Graceful
content: The conical hat is a typical symbol of Vietnamese people in general and women. Vietnam in particular. Now you can own a lovely conical hat through Venus Handicrafts.
